plot: Writer/director Rolla Selbak shares her personal Hollywood vlogs as she visits some of the freshest female filmmakers making it happen today.
plot_en: Writer/director Rolla Selbak shares her personal Hollywood vlogs as she visits some of the freshest female filmmakers making it happen today.
plot_es: Writer/director Rolla Selbak shares her personal Hollywood vlogs as she visits some of the freshest female filmmakers making it happen today.
title: Grrl's Guide to Filmmaking
